sentence.Network_en: Moira sat stiffly upright in her straight-backed chair.
sentence.Network_cn: 莫伊拉直挺挺地坐在她的直背靠椅上。

sentence.Network_en: He finished his conversation and stood up, looking straight at me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说完话站起来，直视着我。

sentence.Network_en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。
